job_history.work_description: Manage daily operations for 80 to 120 aircraft and strengthen relationships with assigned crew members to ensure a seamless travel experience for the client. Responsible for gathering and disseminating timely information to remedy disruptions caused by, but not limited to weather, human error and aircraft abnormalities. Provide a timely, professional and educated resource to crew members by thoroughly researching every concern and calmly resolving elevated issues. Train, mentor and act as a resource to new team members. Collaborated with leadership to create new communication tools for faster and more effective communication between departments.

Responsible for greeting customers and providing an enjoyable shopping experience through excellent customer service, product knowledge and communication. Independently designed store visuals using guidance from corporate standards.

Responsible for providing customer service, database instruction and fielding phone calls. Spearheaded the creation of an interactive advertisement/exhibit for a school play showcasing students' writing and acting talents.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing daily operations, training, and mentoring team members, and collaborating with leadership, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively disseminated timely information to remedy disruptions, provided professional and educated resources to crew members, and created new communication tools, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Calmly resolved elevated issues, thoroughly researched concerns, and provided timely solutions, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided excellent customer service in various roles, including as a Sales Associate and Front Desk Coordinator, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Spearheaded the creation of an interactive advertisement/exhibit, indicating a solid level of proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Team Collaboration
skills.explanation: Collaborated with leadership and crew members to ensure seamless operations, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed daily operations and provided timely solutions, indicating a solid level of proficiency in time management.
